title: Sun - Good Omens Animatic
author: Cheery
comment: There's getting to be too many comments for me to respond to them all (which is absolutely wild!!!!!!!) but know that I read every single one and appreciate you all so much!!!!!!
I love the imagrey of crowley and aziraphale beside the early humans. You told a great story.
"Let there be light, let me be right" with the apple Crowley gave to human and the flaming sword Aziraphale gave to human- oooff the implications. They were right.
I love how you show Crowley and Aziraphale being bettered by humanity, also I just think ancient good omens times is underrated in general

Oh shit... You accomplished it... You made me cry... I was expecting something about the ineffable husbands but I've got something much much better... The true meaning of the book... The love and importance and beauty of humanity... I feel my heart exploiting right now
description:
I started making this one right after I uploaded the freefall animatic--I'm now very tired. This entire video is just me being sentimental about the human race, really. And about Good Omens in general.

Song is Sun by Sleeping at Last :)
